original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū veṭhitasīsassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū veṭhita sīsassa dhammam desenti pe

original: “Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na veṭhita sīsassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na veṭhita sīsassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca veṭhita sīsassa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
